gov.va.med.lom.foundation.service.response.messages

Interface Message

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultMessage

    public interface Message
extends java.io.Serializable
    Message interface definition. A message is an object that consists of a key (used to somehow identify the message's text) and a severity (e.g. 'Error', 'Informational'). Optionally, messages be associated with one or more properties, and may contain insert values used to dynamically populate the message text identified by the message's key.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BEAN_NAME
      Unique string used to create Message instances.

    • Method Detail

      • getKey

        java.lang.String getKey()
        Get the key for this message.
        Returns:
        The message's key - the value used to identify the text for this message

      • getSeverity

        Severity getSeverity()
        Get the severity for this message.
        Returns:
        The Severity enumeration value for this message
        See Also:
        Severity

      • getProperties

        java.util.Collection getProperties()
        Get the collection of properties for this message.
        Returns:
        A non-modifiable, non-null collection of strings containing the properties associated with this messages. Might contain 0..n properties

      • getInserts

        java.util.Collection getInserts()
        Get the inserts for this message.
        Returns:
        A non-modifiable, non-null collection of objects representing the inserts to be used in association with the message key when constructing the full message text

      • setKey

        void setKey(java.lang.String key)
        Update the value of the message's key.
        Parameters:
        key - The key value to be set

      • setSeverity

        void setSeverity(Severity severity)
        Update the value of the message's severity.
        Parameters:
        severity - The severity (enumerated type) value
        See Also:
        Severity

      • addProperty

        void addProperty(java.lang.String property)
        Add a property name to the message. This method can be used by objects that create messages to associate messages with one or properties of the raising object. A message can only be associated with an single property once; multiple calls to addProperty with the same value should only add the property once.
        Parameters:
        property - The property name to be added to the message

      • addInsert

        void addInsert(java.lang.Object insert)
        Add an insert value to the messages. Inserts will be used along with the message key to formulate the full message text.
        Parameters:
        insert - The insert value to be added
